p: The main tasks of the IRN are to: (1) review the public health impact of incidents from a management and coordination perspective, (2) appraise whether routine measures are likely to satisfactorily address the incident, (3) recommend the assessment pathway (including possible actions to gather further information on the issue) to conclude on the appropriate regulatory measure, and (4) recommend the relevant communication tools. Its mandate does not include the scientific assessment of the issue, or the adoption of the final appropriate regulatory action, which are under the remit of the PRAC, CHMP, or the CMDh, as applicable.
